Class ec.transform.coverage.Summarizer 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ec.transform.coverage.Application
           |
           +----ec.transform.coverage.Summarizer
public class Summarizer
extends Application
This class summarizes a logfile and puts the result on standard output. Used to implement ecov-summary.

The actual format of input is:

java Summarizer scriptName logfile

Summarizer()

main(String[])
usage(String)
Report on usage of the application.
